summary: Jean-Luc Godard and François Truffaut, their careers, their friendship and their impact on the French New Wave of the 1960s.
cast: Isild Le Besco|Anouk Aimée|Jean-Pierre Aumont|Charles Aznavour|Antoine de Baecque|Jean-Paul Belmondo|Jacqueline Bisset|Jean-Claude Brialy|Claude Chabrol|Jean Cocteau|Raoul Coutard|Jean Desailly|Marie Dubois|Jean-Luc Godard|Chantal Goya|Claude Jade|Anna Karina|Pierre Kast|Bernadette Lafont|Fritz Lang|Henri Langlois|Jean-Pierre Léaud|Giorgia Moll|Yves Montand|Jeanne Moreau|Macha Méril|Jack Palance|Michel Piccoli|Nicholas Ray|Jacques Rivette|Éric Rohmer|Barbet Schroeder|Jean Seberg|Henri Serre|Delphine Seyrig|Simone Signoret|Anna Stark|László Szabó|François Truffaut|Marina Vlady|Oskar Werner|Anne Wiazemsky
title: Deux de la Vague
